00028 void
00029 XDMMSCPI::changeFunction()
00030 {
00031     std::string func = function()->to_str();
00032     if(!func.empty())
00033         interface()->sendf(":CONF:%s", func.c_str());
00034 }
00035 double
00036 XDMMSCPI::fetch()
00037 {
00038     interface()->query(":FETC?");
00039     return interface()->toDouble();
00040 }

00056 XHP3458A::XHP3458A(const char *name, bool runtime,
00057          const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00058          const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00059          const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00060          const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00061     XCharDeviceDriver<XDMM>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers)
00062 {
00063     interface()->setGPIBMAVbit(0x80);
00064     interface()->setGPIBUseSerialPollOnWrite(false);
00065     const char *funcs[] = {
00066         "DCV", "ACV", "ACDCV", "OHM", "OHMF", "DCI", "ACI", "ACDCI", "FREQ", "PER", "DSAC", "DSDC", "SSAC", "SSDC", ""
00067     };
00068     for(const char **func = funcs; strlen(*func); func++) {
00069         function()->add(*func);
00070     }
00071 }
00072 void
00073 XHP3458A::changeFunction()
00074 {
00075     std::string func = function()->to_str();
00076     if(!func.empty())
00077         interface()->sendf("FUNC %s;ARANGE ON", func.c_str());
00078 }
00079 double
00080 XHP3458A::fetch()
00081 {
00082     interface()->receive();
00083     return interface()->toDouble();
00084 }
00085 double
00086 XHP3458A::oneShotRead()
00087 {
00088     interface()->query("END ALWAYS;OFORMAT ASCII;QFORMAT NUM;NRDGS 1;TRIG AUTO;TARM SGL");
00089     return interface()->toDouble();
00090 }

00093 XHP3478A::XHP3478A(const char *name, bool runtime,
00094          const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00095          const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00096          const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00097          const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00098     XCharDeviceDriver<XDMM>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers)
00099 {
00100     interface()->setGPIBUseSerialPollOnWrite(false);
00101     interface()->setGPIBMAVbit(0x01);
00102 //  setEOS("\r\n");
00103     const char *funcs[] = {
00104         "DCV", "ACV", "OHM", "OHMF", "DCI", "ACI", ""
00105     };
00106     for(const char **func = funcs; strlen(*func); func++) {
00107         function()->add(*func);
00108     }
00109 }
00110 void
00111 XHP3478A::changeFunction()
00112 {
00113     int func = *function();
00114     if(func < 0)
00115         return;
00116 //          throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(KAME::i18n("Select function!"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00117     interface()->sendf("F%dRAZ1", func + 1);
00118 }
00119 double
00120 XHP3478A::fetch()
00121 {
00122     interface()->receive();
00123     return interface()->toDouble();
00124 }
00125 double
00126 XHP3478A::oneShotRead()
00127 {
00128     interface()->query("T3");
00129     return interface()->toDouble();
00130 }

00132 XSanwaPC500::XSanwaPC500(const char *name, bool runtime,
00133          const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00134          const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00135          const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00136          const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00137     XCharDeviceDriver<XDMM>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers)
00138 {
00139     interface()->setSerialBaudRate(9600);
00140     interface()->setSerialStopBits(2);
00141     
00142     const char *funcs[] = {
00143         "AcV", "DcV", "Ac+DcV", "Cx", "Dx", "Dx", "TC", "TC", "TF", "Ohm",
00144         "Conti", "AcA", "DcA", "Ac+DcA", "Hz", "Duty%", "%mA", "dB", "?", ""
00145     };
00146     for(const char **func = funcs; strlen(*func); func++) {
00147         function()->add(*func);
00148     }
00149     function()->str(std::string("?"));
00150 }
00151 void
00152 XSanwaPC500::changeFunction() {
00153 }
00154 double
00155 XSanwaPC500::fetch() {
00156     msecsleep(200);
00157     requestData();
00158     interface()->receive(8);
00159     if((interface()->buffer()[0] != 0x10) ||
00160         (interface()->buffer()[1] != 0x02))
00161         throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(KAME::i18n("Format Error!"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00162     if((interface()->buffer()[6] != 0x00) ||
00163         (interface()->buffer()[7] != 0x00))
00164         throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(KAME::i18n("Format Error!"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00165     const int funcs[] = {0x05, 0x06, 0x07, 0x08, 0x04, 0x14, 0x00, 0x20, 0x40, 0x80,
00166         0x180, 0x201, 0x202, 0x203, 0x400, 0x800, 0x802, 0x2000
00167     };
00168     int f = (int)interface()->buffer()[4] + (int)interface()->buffer()[5] * 256u;
00169     for(int i = 0; i < (int)sizeof(funcs)/(int)sizeof(int); i++) {
00170         if(funcs[i] == f) {
00171             function()->value(i);
00172         }
00173     }
00174 
00175     int dlen = interface()->buffer()[3] - 1;
00176     interface()->receive(dlen);
00177     std::vector<char> buf(dlen);
00178     memcpy(&buf[0], &interface()->buffer()[0], dlen);
00179     dbgPrint(std::string(&buf[0]));
00180     if(buf.size() < 6)
00181         throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(KAME::i18n("Format Error!"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00182     buf[dlen - 3] = '\0';
00183     if((std::string(&buf[0]) == "+OL") || (std::string(&buf[0]) == " OL")) {
00184         return 1e99;
00185     }
00186     if(std::string(&buf[0]) == "-OL") {
00187         return -1e99;
00188     }
00189     if(buf.size() < 14)
00190         throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(KAME::i18n("Format Error!"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00191     double x;
00192     if(sscanf(&buf[0], "%8lf", &x) != 1) {
00193         throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(KAME::i18n("Format Error!"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00194     }
00195     double e;
00196     if(sscanf(&buf[8], "E%2lf", &e) != 1) {
00197         throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(KAME::i18n("Format Error!"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00198     }
00199     return x * pow(10.0, e);
00200 }
00201 double
00202 XSanwaPC500::oneShotRead() {
00203     return fetch();
00204 }
00205 void
00206 XSanwaPC500::requestData() {
00207     char bytes[8] = {0x10, 0x02, 0x42, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x10, 0x03};
00208     interface()->write(bytes, sizeof(bytes));
00209 }

00219 void
00220 XSanwaPC5000::requestData() {
00221     char bytes[8] = {0x10, 0x02, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x10, 0x03};
00222     interface()->write(bytes, sizeof(bytes));
